name: Spyder (itch) (Charlotte Narwhal)
description:
Controls:

Fire Gun - Left click

Switch Reality - Right Click

Move - WASD

Jump - Space

Crouch - Left Shift

Description:

Spyder is an FPS in the style of retro games such as Quake. The player plays as a spy codenamed 'Spyder' as they infiltrate a secret base to steal technology that allows the user to switch between the real world and the digital world. Using this ability Spyder can use platforms that are solid in one reality but not the other to get to areas otherwise inaccessible.
